checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/agent' should be added.
Capability Drop list should be set to ALL. Add the specific ones you need to the Add list and set an override label.

Capability "SYS_ADMIN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/agent.allow-capability-sys-admin: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_PTRACE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/agent.allow-capability-sys-ptrace: SomeReason'.
hostPID is set to 'true' in PodSpec. It should be set to 'false'.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
allowPrivilegeEscalation not set which allows privilege escalation. It should be set to 'false'.
privileged is set to 'true' in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'false'.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is not set in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
